mapper.select: SELECT a.user_no AS USER_NO ,a.board_no AS BOARD_NO ,a.category_code AS CATEGORY_CODE ,a.title AS TITLE ,a.content AS CONTENT ,a.create_date AS CREATE_DATE ,a.modify_date AS MODIFY_DATE ,a.is_delete AS IS_DELETE ,a.hits AS HITS ,a.recommend AS RECOMMEND ,a.is_notice AS IS_NOTICE ,b.user_id AS USER_ID ,b.name AS NAME FROM solyi_board a LEFT JOIN t_user b on a.user_no = b.user_no
